author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 18, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1503967502}
review:
Tags: Combat Arena & Smashbroesque
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Limited content. Lackluster featureset. Limited audiovisual assets. Repetitive gameplay. Outcompeted in the genre. 

Sort of a rock paper scissor VS game. The autoaim works automatically but trying to adjust aiming just breaks it and makes it near impossible to land a shot. Mostly based on timing your attack and playing cat and mouse. 

We found it would be difficult to predict if a dash would save you or still get you skewered and killed. The limited amount of arenas, the flat texturing without microdetails and the limited roster of combattants make the game very short lived. After a few duels we were done. Co-op was not well designed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065012035', 'num_games_owned': 253, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 33, 'last_played': 1502292268}
review:
I've only played for a little bit, but I can already tell.

This game is nothing, it's honestly purely a concept, no variety, no change, just a solid experience that doesn't change ever.

I enjoyed it while I played it, and I will play more but you got to be kidding, I can't belive this is a "full" release.
This seemes like the *very* early stages of the game.
It's like when you make something and it's not yet finished, but you still show your friends even though it isn't all done.

I can't complain since I picked it up for a dollar, if you wanna have like 2-3 hours of gmae party, yeah pick it up. (ON SALE)

Positives:

- Cool concept (yeah, just that.)
- Nice funny slow-mo events when someone dies.

Negatives:

- Shitty controlls, many have stated this already, but you just can't understand how a big of a deal it is until you play.
   If you play the co-op game mode, you will need to survive against waves of wolves, but they come from all sides and
   corners, you can only shoot what you are walking torwards. THIS GETS YOU INSTANTLY KILLED.

- It runs horribly, got all the requirement (recommended) and I can only play it while turning all the options to off. 
  (Only 2 options, so yeah... you'll game will have to look horrbile.

- THIS GAME IS NOTHING, it has nothing to offer except for the 2 minutes of what you saw in the trailer.
   No spicing it up, no veriaty of weapons, areans (which are half-assed anyway.) no option of combat style differences, 
   no game tweaking options (which are needed if the game is doing such a shit job with spicing thing up.

   Baiscally, 5 dollars for this is just plain stealing.
   Would price it at 0.5 dollars, but whatever, I guess for a dollar it's okay.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997172478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1013, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1470624423}
review:
[h1] Such a meeehh[/h1]
Well, geez, the game may not be bad, it looks pleasant and offers unusual gameplay, but at the same time it is only for CO-OP on one computer.
It's underdeveloped, and a bit boring. Few maps, not much to do, gameplay is not some skill so it does not give satisfaction and quickly tires.

The production lacks something, maybe an idea for itself, for something more, and it's a pity, because the general idea is not bad and it could be a nice game to play with friends, but it's just a bummer. Even the lack of bots to play alone completely takes away the sense of buying this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198057206182', 'num_games_owned': 265, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1464806538}
review:
I've had this for months now. Never managed to actually play it.

I've asked for help on the forums. Got a reply from a dev. telling me to press space on the menu in order to advance. Went back there, pressed space, nothing happens.

0/10 would try and fail to even get to the gameplay.
developer_response: What is not working ?, you need at least two Input devices to test the pvp mode. You can test the co-op mode yourself, but again it's designed for multiplayer as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160064095', 'num_games_owned': 1273, 'num_reviews': 182, 'playtime_forever': 162, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 162, 'last_played': 1459551986}
review: Controls take a little getting used. Also has a bit of mini-game or mobile casual game feel, lacking a little polish. But it's not as bad as some of the negative reviews suggest. The 3D graphics are OK, if a little glitchy, the campfire is really atmospheric. The co-op mode against the wolves is super addictive! Sometimes the pace feels a little slow and running around picking up things gets tedious. Making the blood stains fade a bit might make it a little more family friendly too. Perhaps one to get on special if you have some friends in the same room to play against with gamepads. For the price there are better similar titles out there, for example Super Snow Fight which has many more power-ups and game modes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043322571', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1468103841}
review:
Fun same-screen couch game with friends. A bit glicthy, but the glitches add to the antics. I recommend picking this up on a sale if you have friends to play same-screen with.

4 player Co-op and versus modes. Co-op sets you as a group of people survivng against an onslaught of wolves by throwing stones and spears. You can save a friend who gets attacked by killing the wolf before it runs off screen. Versus mode puts you in an arena to stun your friends with rocks and kill them with spears.

8/10 fun for a few hours with friends, no singleplayer value.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011965365', 'num_games_owned': 2442, 'num_reviews': 2092, 'playtime_forever': 31, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1449668918}
review:
I found myself just spamming the shift button just to get to rocks and spears and avoiding getting killed by the wolves. The game does have some fun with it, when you are playing with a friend but other then that its boring.

Pros
Xbox360 controller
Versus and coop

Cons
No online mode
Can get stuck on some rocks
Needs more items to throw other than spears and rocks
lacks a lot of features
Music gets annoying! (Can turn off music)

author: {'steamid': '76561198037166965', 'num_games_owned': 1508, 'num_reviews': 219, 'playtime_forever': 380, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 380, 'last_played': 1446645220}
review:
Rumble unfortunately I was not Impressed, in single and boring, because the game in its simplicity is boring and frustrating.
I like the style of play, but if you really want to buy just to play in multiplayer, and maybe waiting a few discounts!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wgx8E5wM7wI
[h1] (Below is the Italian full review) [/h1] 

Hai mai sognato di lanciare una lancia prettamente nudo? bene questa è la tua occasione...
Rumble è un gioco basato sulla modalità multiplayer fino a 4 giocatori, dove bisogna lanciare pietre per stordire o lance per uccidere!

[h1] Feature: [/h1] 

1-4 Giocatori

Modalità Multiplayer, uccidi i tuoi avversarsi in livelli unici

Modalità Co-op, collabora con i tuoi amici, lottando contro lupi svelateci 

Supporto al Gamepad


[h1] Parere Personale: [/h1] 

Purtroppo Rumble non mi ha colpito, in singolo è noioso, perché il gameplay nella sua semplicità risulta noioso e frustante.
Mi piace lo stile del gioco, ma se proprio lo volete acquistare compratelo per giocarci in Multiplayer, e magari aspettando qualche sconto!

author: {'steamid': '76561197981255414', 'num_games_owned': 708, 'num_reviews': 196, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1444902310}
review:
After seeing the response from the developers I have decided to private list the previous review.

They made me feel bad for giving them such a hard time more or less. 

However, Since this is a review, I will still note the things that need to change for the game to be playable.

-Multiplayer - The game is currently local play only.

-Controls - The controls need to be revamped dramatically.

-Starting Menu - I wouldn't say it's insanely difficult to get into a game, but it is extremely confusing to get the game started, even if you are going to play by yourself.

-----------------

Devs I regret the way I said the things that I did, however, when the game improves, the Vulgar Game Trailer Review will not be for the faint of heart. 

Most of my attitude changed when I realized you are the same guys that I backed for Cornerstone.
developer_response: Do you want help getting the to work for you, or do you just want to bash it ?
